attributes.additional_details:
The government should bring in laws to limit the price that insurance companies can charge for car insurance premiums, to keep them at an affordable rate.

Recent premiums have reached outrageous prices, on top of the rising cost of living more and more people are finding it hard to find the money to pay for car insurance. It is estimated that there are over 2 million uninsured drivers riding on Britain roads, this number would be drastically reduced if insurance premiums wasn't so high.
